Body: I have a ZTE SONATA 2 With Major Storage Issues! I Cannot Send/Receive Texts, I Cannot Open My TV Guide App, I Cannot UPDATE or DOWNLOAD Anything! I CLEAR My Caches After EVERYTHING I DO!... And Nothing Gets Resolved! I have a 35gb SD Card that Doesn't EEVEN Seem to be Recognized! PLEEEZ?! Will You Advise Me What I MUST DO To RESOLVE THIS?! I Am Beyond FRUSTRATED! HELP ME... please? Asap would be so much Appreciated, too!
Title: I cannot send or receive Texts B-cuz I am NOT ABLE TO FREE UP STORAGE SPACE! Please tell me How To Do It? I have a ZTE Sonata 2!
